adDetails: Need help to reduce clutter and organize your home but don't know where to begin? I am a very organized, detailed individual with a passion for organizing! I can help you create a more efficient, organized and calm environment. Specializing in residential and home office organization: - Bedrooms, bathrooms, closets, kitchens, living rooms, kids' playrooms, garages, storage units - Home office organization -- paperwork and computer files If interested, please send me an e-mail to arrange appointment for a free phone consultation.
